name: setMqttSettings
function 1
subscribe
func:
let tempUserCreds = RED.util.cloneMessage(global.get('tempUserCreds'))
global.set('userCreds', tempUserCreds)
let globalTopic = tempUserCreds.aid + "/" + tempUserCreds.cid + "/" + "registration" + "/" + tempUserCreds.deviceId + "/"
msg.action = "subscribe"
msg.topic = globalTopic + "#"



let obj = {}
obj.payload = {}
obj.payload.cid = "Company ID: " + tempUserCreds.cid
obj.payload.aid = "Account ID: " + tempUserCreds.aid
obj.payload.deviceId = "Device ID: " + tempUserCreds.deviceId
return [msg, obj]
